{{value.name}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-body', templateUrl: './body.component.html', styleUrls: ['./body.component.css'] }) export class BodyComponent implements OnInit { button: string = 'Add'; taskList: any[] = [] newTaskForm = this.formBuilder.group({ taskItem: '', taskDate: '', taskTime: '' }) constructor( private formBuilder: FormBuilder ) { } addTask() { const value = this.newTaskForm.value.taskItem this.taskList.push({ id: this.taskList.length, name: value }) this.newTaskForm.reset(); } task: string = document.getElementById('inputText'); }
